name: Le Trung Tin
description: As a Project Manager and a Product Owner, Tin is responsible for analyzing requirements, designing the system architechure. Moreover, handling all of the crucial front-end task.

name: Hoang Ngoc Anh Duc
description: Duc serves as the project's scrum master, front-end developer, and model. He is in charge of the UX/UI design, ensuring that everyone completes their tasks on time, and the recored data of the website.

name: Ngo Nhat Minh
description: Minh is a member of the back-end team and the database manager, assisting in authentication, back-end deployment, and exercise recording.

name: Nguyen Huu Phan Duy Vu
description: Vu is the part of the back-end, taken the responsibility for the most of of the back-end ranging from functionality to error tracking.
